last_episode_to_air.name: Life is a plan B
last_episode_to_air.overview: It’s Debi’s wedding day, but Tamara notices her sister isn't happy. She lets her know she'll support her in case she backs out and manages to get them something to cope with the stressful event. Eliezer refuses to go to the wedding, but the women join forces to make the bride happy.

name: The End of Love
overview: After a reunion with her past, Tamara - a Jewish ex-orthodox turned feminist rocker - separates from her boyfriend, rebelling against romantic love and monogamy to embark on a path of exploration in search of her own desire.

episodes.name: The female version of James Dean
episodes.overview: Tamara, an edgy feminist philosopher, rediscovers a past she thought she had left behind.

episodes.name: Field recognition
episodes.overview: Tamara wakes up at her mother’s house and finds the orthopedic corset she used to wear as a teenager. Amid an existential crisis and surrounded by memories, she begins a journey in search of her independence.

episodes.name: Proving the unlikely
episodes.overview: Tamara attempts to get her family’s authorization to stay at her grandparents’ house. She visits them at their nursing home and promises to spend Pesach with them, after years of skipping family gatherings. Laura and Juana accompany her to an event organized by Ofelia, the waitress at Ladorada, to which Tamara wants to go with dubious intentions.

episodes.name: A female stranger arrives in town
episodes.overview: Tamara returns to the school she attended as a child and overhears the Literature lesson Sara is teaching to a group of students. She walks with Sara through her daily chores while searching for the topic for her next column. Her editor pressures her and Tamara dives into the night with her friends looking for new experiences. The three friends reconnect with the city and its parallel worlds.

episodes.name: Explorers of love
episodes.overview: Tamara presents a column about affective responsibility; Federico, who overhears, is outraged. Tam and Laura, undercover, attend a workshop about jealousy for polyamorous people while Juana fights with her mother. The friends argue and spend the night apart.

episodes.name: The market of desire
episodes.overview: Tamara goes to therapy for the first time. Then she meets a sexy, younger neighbor she had never noticed before. Juana and Federico match on Tinder. Laura reconciles with Mora, who makes her a risky proposal. In the middle of a strange power outage, Tamara connects with her young neighbor's mother. Federico has a date with a girl who seems to be just what he needs.

episodes.name: Let another one begin
episodes.overview: Tamara is startled awake by Ruth and Juana who are cleaning her apartment. Juana forces her to exercise and looks for the moment to tell her that she found Federico on Tinder. Tamara pretends not to care. Tamara invites Ofelia to her childhood school and they participate in Sara's class. In therapy, Tam reflects on her relationship with women based on a complaint from Sara.

episodes.name: Three sisters
episodes.overview: Debi and Mijal arrive in the city and settle at the apartment Tamara is living in. The sisters are here for Debi’s upcoming wedding and force Tamara to participate in the arrangements and celebrations. Tamara can’t resist the tradition of the bridal shower and finally manages to merge her two worlds.

episodes.name: I'm going to be lucky
episodes.overview: Rodo is accused of sexual misconduct on social media. Tamara, shocked, drops her phone on the toilet, which keeps her offline for the rest of the day. An accident with Bobe Jaia puts the family in check and ends up involving the whole neighborhood.

episodes.name: Life is a plan B
episodes.overview: It’s Debi’s wedding day, but Tamara notices her sister isn't happy. She lets her know she'll support her in case she backs out and manages to get them something to cope with the stressful event. Eliezer refuses to go to the wedding, but the women join forces to make the bride happy.
